item.title: Hidden missing data
item.description: No, you can’t always get what you want You can’t always get what you want You can’t always get what you want But if you try sometime You’ll find You get what you need – Mick Jagger and Keith Richards There’s nothing like missing values to mess up a model. But you have to work with what you get. The data set is not often coded with NAs where data would be for an observation of a variable, sometimes it is blank.
